## stringType() function

Create a union of string literals (i.e. `'hello' | 'world'`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function stringType<T extends string[]>(...value: T): IUnionType<StringLiterals<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | <code>...string[]</code> A list of string literals to parse |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IUnionType](./tscgen.iuniontype.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StringLiterals](./tscgen.stringliterals.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;
